plot: Stars are seen at the Father and Sons barbecue and the laying of the cornerstone of Bing Crosby's Delmar Racetrack; Fredric March receives a giant postcard; Anita Stewart shows home movies of past stars.
title: Screen Snapshots Series 16, No. 5
plot_es: Stars are seen at the Father and Sons barbecue and the laying of the cornerstone of Bing Crosby's Delmar Racetrack; Fredric March receives a giant postcard; Anita Stewart shows home movies of past stars.
plot_en: Stars are seen at the Father and Sons barbecue and the laying of the cornerstone of Bing Crosby's Delmar Racetrack; Fredric March receives a giant postcard; Anita Stewart shows home movies of past stars.
